snippet.title: HAWKEN - Official Gameplay (Work in Progress)
snippet.description:
You are free to fight!
Join the Open Beta now: http://www.playhawken.com/#enlist/

Adhesive Games is developing Hawken, a new Mech Combat FPS. 

There are many aspects of the game, some already finished, that are not shown in this video. However we feel it gives a good first glimpse and are looking forward to releasing more media!
